comment: For the fifth day of Christmas let the magic move you for your chance to win of gift cards to spend at ! You have until midnight tonight ( th December ) to enter and record a km run . <URL> <URL>
amr:
# ::snt For the fifth day of Christmas let the magic move you for your chance to win of gift cards to spend at ! You have until midnight tonight ( th December ) to enter and record a km run . <URL> <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (m2 / move-01
                  :ARG0 (m3 / magic)
                  :ARG1 y
                  :purpose (c / chance-02
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (w / win-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (c2 / card
                                    :mod (g / gift)
                                    :ARG3-of (s / spend-01
                                          :ARG0 y)))))
            :time (d / day
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 5)
                  :part-of (f / festival
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Christmas"))))
      :snt2 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (u / until
                  :op1 (m4 / midnight
                        :time (d2 / date-entity
                              :dayperiod (n2 / night)
                              :mod (t / today)
                              :weekday (t2 / th
                                    :month 12
                                    :dayperiod m4)
                              :op1-of t2))))
      :purpose (a / and
            :op1 (e / enter-01
                  :ARG0 y2)
            :op2 (r / record-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (r2 / run-02
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (d3 / distance-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (k / kilometer))))))

comment: I'm planning to do my last marathon of the year today . Will it could for the next days
amr:
# ::snt I'm planning to do my last marathon of the year today . Will it could for the next days
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (r / run-02
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (m2 / marathon
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                              :value "-1")
                        :part-of (y / year))
                  :time (t / today)))
      :snt2 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / run-02
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
                  :time (d / day
                        :mod (n / next)))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)))

comment: Marathon done Was tough having not done anything more than miles since mid Nov and weighed down by Xmas food and drink but finished with a smile and managed a mile hobble back to the car
amr:

(t / tough-02
      :ARG1 (d / do-02

                        :time (s / since
